name: Awakened White Moose
book: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.Charge: If the moose moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with an antlers attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14+1d4 + 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
traits.Sure-Footed: The moose has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

actions.Multiattack: The moose makes two attacks: one with its antlers and one with its hooves.
actions.Antlers: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.Hooves: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
